name: Magic In My Heart 3 - The Crystal of Shadows
name_original: Magic In My Heart 3 - The Crystal of Shadows
description:
The all new sequel-of-the-sequel in the Magic In My Heart franchise!

Choose and name your character, then send them on an epic quest to destroy a malicious crystal that's creating monsters! Explore fascinating and epic worlds, and unlock new abilities along the way! Can you stop the evil in Wonderland Grove?

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
CONTROLS
Z - Select
X - Cancel, Menu
Arrow Keys - Movement (With all new Diagonal Movement!)
Enter and Space - Select
